content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a rental price of 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price agreed upon was 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I didn't rate my satisfaction in the conversation, but I believe my goal was to reach a fair price for an apartment of this quality in the city center, which we achieved.
name: Haoyu Wang
